UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the Profit Pakistan Pro application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile photo, if available.

AnalysisRecord.title: AnalysisRecord
AnalysisRecord.description: Represents a single analysis record (either product launch plan or ad feasibility check) associated with a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the AnalysisRecord entity.

productName.description: Name of the product being analyzed.

date.description: Date and time when the analysis was performed.

results.description: The JSON results of the analysis.

FreeUsage.title: FreeUsage
FreeUsage.description: Tracks the free usage of report exports and AI prompts for a user within a 24-hour period.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the user or device.

lastReset.description: Timestamp of the last usage counter reset.

exportsUsed.description: Number of report exports used in the current period.

aiPromptsUsed.description: Number of AI prompts used in the current period.

Plan.title: Plan
Plan.description: Describes a pricing plan for the application.

highlight.description: A short highlight of the plan.

features.description: List of features included in the plan.

image.description: URL of the ad banner image.

PaymentRequest.title: PaymentRequest
PaymentRequest.description: Represents a manual payment submission from a user for a Pro upgrade.

transactionId.description: The transaction or reference ID from the payment service.

status.description: The verification status of the payment.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Accessible only by the user.

/users/{userId}/history/{recordId}.description: Stores analysis records for each user.

/free_usage/{userId}.description: Tracks free usage for each user.

/plans/{planId}.description: Stores details about the pricing plans, which are publicly readable.

/ads/{adId}.description: Stores ad configuration data, which is publicly readable.

/paymentRequests/{requestId}.description: Stores manual payment submissions for Pro upgrades. Writable by anyone, but not readable or updatable by clients.
